## Version Control

### Learn more about how to use Git

[Happy with Git](https://happygitwithr.com/) - resource written specifically for RStudio users who are using GitHub

[GitHub tutorials](https://guides.github.com/) - if you want to use GitHub 

[Good BitBucket tutorials](https://www.atlassian.com/git/tutorials) - from Atlassian, if you want to use Bitbucket instead of GitHub

[GitLab tutorials](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/gitlab-basics/) - if you want to use the free and open source GitLab

[How to Write a Git Commit Message](https://chris.beams.io/posts/git-commit/) - If you want to write good commit messages
